00033 #define UVM_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id,unused,text) \
00034   namespace sc_core { extern const char id[] = text; }

00036 #define CHECK_STOP_AT_PHASE_END() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->check_stop()
00037 
00038 #define NODE_CONSTRUCTION_DONE(pmod) \
00039     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00040     if (comp) \
00041         comp->build_phase(this); \
00042     sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_construction_done(pmod); 
00043 
00044 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_CONSTRUCTION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_end_of_construction();
00045 
00046 #define NODE_CONNECT(pmod) { uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); if (comp) comp->connect_phase(this); }
00047 
00048 #define QUASI_STATIC_COMPLETE_BINDING() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_complete_binding()
00049 
00050 #define NODE_END_OF_ELABORATION(pmod) \
00051     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00052     if (comp) \
00053         comp->end_of_elaboration_phase(this); \
00054     else  \
00055         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_end_of_elaboration(pmod); 
00056 
00057 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_ELABORATION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_end_of_elaboration();
00058 
00059 #define NODE_START_OF_SIMULATION(pmod) \
00060     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00061     if (comp) \
00062         comp->start_of_simulation_phase(this); \
00063     else \
00064         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_start_of_simulation(pmod);
00065 
00066 #define QUASI_STATIC_START_OF_SIMULATION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_start_of_simulation();
00067 
00068 #define QUASI_STATIC_PREPARE_TO_SIMULATE() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_prepare_to_simulate();
00069 
00070 #endif
